item.title: 中国最高金融监管机构承诺稳定民营企业信贷供应
item.description: 周三的一份官方声明显示，中国最高金融监管机构誓言将保持对民营企业稳定有效的信贷供应，并将加大对民营企业贷款的支持力度。【原文：China's top financial regulator vowed it will maintain stable and effective credit supply to private firms and will step up support for their loans, an official statement showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 谷歌同意支付 3.26 亿欧元了结意大利税务案
item.description: 米兰检察官周三表示，在谷歌爱尔兰有限公司同意支付3.26亿欧元（约合3.4亿美元）税款后，他们已要求撤销对该公司的起诉。【原文：Milan's prosecutors said on Wednesday they had asked to drop a case against Google Ireland Ltd after the company agreed to pay 326 million euros ($340 million) over a tax claim.】

item.title: 土耳其媒体报道：泽连斯基称美国矿产提案有待完善
item.description: 周三有报道援引沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基总统的话说，美国提出的一项重要矿产交易提案不公平，因为其中不包括安全保障，他不希望乌克兰成为原材料枢纽。【原文：President Volodymyr Zelenskiy was quoted on Wednesday as saying a U.S. proposal for a critical minerals deal was unfair as it did not include security guarantees, and he did not want Ukraine to become a hub for raw materials.】

item.title: 平衡风险与回报，中国 2 月贷款利率将保持不变
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，预计中国将在周四维持基准贷款利率不变，因为在北京面临新的贸易紧张局势之际，中国政府将在优先考虑金融稳定和提供更多刺激措施之间徘徊。【原文：China is expected to leave its benchmark lending rates unchanged on Thursday, a Reuters poll showed, as authorities walk a fine line between prioritising financial stability and providing more stimulus at a time when Beijing is facing fresh trade tensions.】

item.title: 因美元走强，MTU 航空发动机公司上调 2025 年展望
item.description: 德国发动机制造商 MTU 航空发动机公司（MTU Aero Engines）周三上调了 2025 年的收入预期，其依据是欧元对美元的汇率降低。【原文：German engine manufacturer MTU Aero Engines raised its revenue guidance for 2025 on Wednesday, based on a lower assumed exchange rate of the euro versus the U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 古兹曼、威斯法默将为澳大利亚自由零售商带来乐观收益
item.description: 投资者表示，由于通胀缓解和减税政策鼓励疲惫的消费者重新开始消费，澳大利亚的自由支配零售商预计将公布更好的半年盈利报告。【原文：Australia's discretionary retailers are expected to report improved half-yearly earnings, investors said, as easing inflation and tax cuts encouraged weary consumers to start spending again.】

item.title: 研究称，2025 年美国投资者将在欧洲引领激进主义风潮
item.description: 一项研究周三称，随着美国公司越来越多地参与收购公司以向其管理层施压，预计激进投资者今年将在欧洲各地加大行动力度。【原文：Activist investors are expected to step up their campaigns across Europe this year, with American firms increasingly involved buying into companies to put pressure on their management, a study said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 高盛认为乌克兰停火不会提高俄罗斯产量
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）周三表示，潜在的乌克兰停火以及与之相关的对俄罗斯制裁的放松不太可能大幅增加俄罗斯的石油流量。【原文：A potential Ukraine ceasefire and the associated easing in sanctions on Russia are unlikely to substantially increase Russia's oil flows, Goldman Sachs said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 汇丰银行削减成本，2024 年奖金池持平；员工人数减少 3
item.description: 汇丰银行周三发布的 2024 年财务报告显示，由于新任首席执行官更加关注成本问题，并对这家以亚洲为重点的银行进行了全面重组，汇丰银行去年的员工人数减少了 3%，员工奖金池几乎没有变化。【原文：HSBC's headcount fell 3% last year and its staff bonus pool hardly changed as a new CEO sharpened focus on costs and initiated sweeping restructuring of the Asia-focused lender, showed its 2024 financial report issued on Wednesday.】

item.title: 飞利浦 2025 年可比销售额增长在 1%-3%之间
item.description: 荷兰医疗保健技术公司飞利浦公司周三预测，2025 年可比销售额将增长 1%至 3%，而去年最后一个季度的业绩不及市场预期，部分原因是中国市场出现了两位数的下滑。【原文：Dutch healthcare technology company Philips forecast 2025 comparable sales growth between 1% and 3% on Wednesday after missing market expectations for the final quarter of last year partly due to a double-digit decline in China.】

item.title: 俄罗斯财富基金认为美国公司将于 2025 年回归
item.description: 塔斯社（TASS）援引俄罗斯主权财富基金负责人基里尔-德米特里耶夫（Kirill Dmitriev）周三在沙特举行的美俄会谈后的话说，俄罗斯主权财富基金预计最早在2025年第二季度就会有一些美国公司重返俄罗斯。【原文：Russia's sovereign wealth fund expects a number of U.S. companies to return to Russia as early as the second quarter of 2025, TASS quoted the head of the fund, Kirill Dmitriev, as saying on Wednesday after U.S.-Russian talks in Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场对关税誓言逐渐麻木
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，马斯克的 X 公司正在洽谈以 440 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体公司 X 正在洽谈以 440 亿美元的估值向投资者融资。【原文：Elon Musk's social media company X is in talks to raise money from investors at a $44 billion valuation, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 汇丰银行 2024 年利润超预期；宣布回购 20 亿美元股票
item.description: 汇丰银行周三公布的年度利润增长 6.6%，超过市场预期，原因是在全面重组推高成本的一年里，收入抵御住了利率下降的影响。【原文：HSBC reported a 6.6% rise in annual profit on Wednesday, beating market expectations, as income withstood the impact of falling interest rates during a year in which sweeping restructuring pushed up costs.】

item.title: 三井物产拟斥资 53 亿美元收购澳大利亚罗兹岭铁矿石项目的权益
item.description: 日本贸易公司三井物产周三表示，将以 53.4 亿美元的价格收购澳大利亚罗兹岭铁矿石项目 40% 的权益。【原文：Japanese trading house Mitsui said on Wednesday it would acquire a 40% interest in the Rhodes Ridge iron ore project in Australia for $5.34 billion.】

item.title: 摩根大通上调新加坡股票评级至增持
item.description: 摩根大通（JP Morgan）分析师周三将新加坡股票评级上调至增持，理由是估值便宜、股息收益率高以及政府采取了振兴国内股市的举措。【原文：JP Morgan analysts upgraded Singapore equities to overweight on Wednesday, citing inexpensive valuations, high dividend yields as well as government initiatives to revive the domestic stock market.】

item.title: 香港关注加密货币衍生品和保证金贷款，推动数字资产发展
item.description: 据香港金融监管机构称，香港正在考虑批准新的加密货币和虚拟资产产品作为衍生品，并为这些产品的某些投资者提供保证金贷款。【原文：Hong Kong is considering approving new cryptocurrency and virtual assets products as derivatives and margin lending for certain investors in those products, according to the city's financial regulator.】

item.title: 石油因美国和俄罗斯减少供应而上涨，市场寻求乌克兰谈判的明朗前景
item.description: 在美国和俄罗斯石油供应中断以及市场等待乌克兰和谈明朗化的背景下，周三油价走高。【原文：Oil prices edged higher on Wednesday amid oil supply disruptions in the U.S. and Russia and as markets awaited clarity on the Ukraine peace talks.】

item.title: 一月份中国新房价格停滞不前，房地产行业举步维艰
item.description: 周三的官方数据显示，1月份中国新房价格环比停滞不前，这表明，尽管政府继续努力支撑市场，但受危机影响的房地产行业仍在努力企稳。【原文：China's new home prices stalled month-on-month in January, official data showed on Wednesday, suggesting the crisis-hit property sector is struggling to stabilise despite continued government efforts to prop up the market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第四季度工资增速为两年多来最慢
item.description: 尽管失业率接近历史低点，澳大利亚第四季度的工资年增长率仍是两年多来最慢的，这表明强劲的劳动力市场并不妨碍通胀率的进一步下降。【原文：Australian wages rose at the slowest annual pace in more than two years in the fourth quarter even as unemployment stayed near historic lows, suggesting the strong labour market was not a bar to further declines in inflation.】

item.title: 新西兰央行降息 50 个基点
item.description: 新西兰央行周三将基准利率下调50个基点至3.75%，决策者们试图重振陷入困境的经济。【原文：New Zealand's central bank cut its benchmark rate by 50 basis points to 3.75% on Wednesday as policymakers sought to revive a struggling economy, and markets bet that moderating inflation will bring borrowing costs even lower over coming months.】

item.title: 美元因乌克兰紧张局势而走强，奇异果等待新西兰央行决定
item.description: 周三，美元因关税担忧和紧张的俄乌谈判而走高，而新西兰元则因交易商准备再次超大规模降息而企稳。【原文：The U.S. dollar perked up on Wednesday on the back of tariff concerns and tense Russia-Ukraine negotiations, while the New Zealand dollar steadied as traders braced for another super-sized interest rate cut.】

item.title: 日本出口连续第四个月增长；担心美国征收汽车关税
item.description: 周三的数据显示，日本出口连续第四个月增长，这表明在对美国关税政策日益担忧的情况下，强劲的全球需求正在支撑日本的经济复苏。【原文：Japan's exports rose for a fourth consecutive month, data showed on Wednesday, signalling that strong global demand is underpinning the country's economic recovery amid growing concerns over U.S. tariff policies.】

item.title: 美国参议院确认坎托菲茨杰拉德的卢特尼克出任商务部部长
item.description: 美国参议院周二以 51 票赞成、45 票反对的结果确认了唐纳德-特朗普总统提名的华尔街公司 Cantor Fitzgerald 的董事长兼首席执行官、亿万富翁霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）为商务部部长。【原文：The U.S. Senate voted on Tuesday by a 51-45 vote to confirm President Donald Trump's nominee Howard Lutnick, the billionaire chairman and CEO of Wall Street firm Cantor Fitzgerald, to run the Commerce Department.】

item.title: 新加坡电信第三季度净利润增长 22
item.description: 新加坡电信公司（Singapore Telecommunications）周三公布的第三季度基本净利润增长 22%，主要得益于其澳大利亚电信部门 Optus 的强劲贡献。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications reported a 22% rise in its third-quarter underlying net profit on Wednesday, boosted by strong contributions from its Australian telecom unit Optus.】

item.title: 新加坡大华银行第四季度利润超预期，公布 22 亿美元资本回报
item.description: 新加坡大华银行（UOB）周三公布的第四季度净利润增长9%，超过预期，并宣布了一项30亿新元（22.4亿美元）的剩余资本返还计划，之后该行维持了2025年的业绩指导。【原文：Singapore's United Overseas Bank, or UOB , maintained its guidance for 2025 after posting on Wednesday a 9% rise in fourth-quarter net profit that beat expectations and announcing a S$3 billion ($2.24 billion) package to return surplus capital.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州法官为反洗钱法的执行扫清障碍
item.description: 德克萨斯州的一名联邦法官周二取消了一项命令，该命令阻止了一项反洗钱法的实施，该法迫使数百万企业实体向财政部披露其真实受益所有人的身份。【原文：A federal judge in Texas on Tuesday lifted an order that blocked the enforcement of an anti-money laundering law that forces millions of business entities to disclose the identities of their real beneficial owners to the Treasury Department.】

item.title: 日本制造商 2 月份情绪连续第二个月好转：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社 Tankan 民意调查显示，2 月份日本制造商的商业景气连续第二个月攀升，预计到 5 月份将再次改善，尽管幅度不大。【原文：Business sentiment for Japanese manufacturers climbed for a second straight month in February and is expected to have improved again by May, albeit modestly, the Reuters Tankan poll found.】

item.title: Mondelez 首席执行官称肯尼迪议程产品重新配方将意味着涨价
item.description: Mondelez 公司首席执行官德克-范-德-普特（Dirk van de Put）周二表示，奥利奥制造商将面临美国卫生部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr）发起的 "让美国再次健康起来 "运动带来的新的成本压力，美国人将看到价格上涨。【原文：Mondelez CEO Dirk van de Put on Tuesday said the Oreo maker will face new cost pressures from the Make America Healthy Again movement spearheaded by U.S. health secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr and that Americans would see price hikes.】

item.title: 恒天然为面向消费者的业务寻找潜在买家，任命 IPO 团队
item.description: 乳业巨头恒天然周三表示，将在未来几周内与全球消费者业务和综合业务的潜在买家接触，并任命了主要管理团队成员，为首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Dairy giant Fonterra said on Wednesday it would engage with potential buyers of its global consumer business and integrated businesses over the coming weeks, and also named key management team members in preparation for an initial public offering.】
